P

PaintMeAPicture - Class in <Unnamed>
The PaintMeAPicture class creates the program execution window as a JFrame.
PaintMeAPicture() - Constructor for class PaintMeAPicture
The class constructor is responsible for initializing the JFrame through a call of super.
Picture - Class in <Unnamed>
The Picture class creates the picture that the player will be colouring in.
Picture(String[], int) - Constructor for class Picture
The class constructor creates a new picture object it passes in the colours in the picture, and the difficulty for the picture to be used later on in the program

The play() method.
